item.title: Course Review - Intro To Tensorflow
item.description: Introduction to TensorFlow for AI, ML, & DL (Source: deeplearning.ai) First and foremost, thanks to Coursera and deepLearning.ai for granting me the scholarship to take this course. I owe them. :) I have planned to write an honest and short review about the course, I just completed it today. Things that you need to know before taking this course, whether it is suitable for you and so on. So, let us directly jump in.
